title: Cantina Vegetariana
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Organic, Raw, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Bakery, Brazilian
description: Wide array of raw foods, very few dishes use dairy, tofu is preferred for pizzas. Vegetarian buffet with mostly vegan options, including desserts. Natural juices and coconut water available. Integral pizzas on Fridays, Brazilian vegan feijoada on Thursdays. A small organic store is also on premises. Price is per kg. Located at the side of CHESF, a big energy company, near the Federal University.
